Product.Name: Nitrile Coated All-purpose Gloves
Product.Description:
This versatile glove is made of 100% polyester and coated with Nitrile, a manmade rubber that provides high dexterity and a snug fit but contains no latex. Knit wrists keep out debris.

Product.Name: Nitrile Foam Dipped Gloves
Product.Description:
For a snug fit and great dexterity, this glove combines nylon with a nitrile foam coating that resists punctures, cuts, snags, and abrasions. The extended cuff and large adjustable wristband make wearing this glove easy.

Materials: Nylon, Nitrile foam coating
